# "Noise in the marine environment"

## Sources of noise

* Shipping noise
* Pile driving
* Seismic airgun
* Military sonar
* Acoustic deterrents


## Impacts of noise

* Behavioural change  
* Displacement – ie animals leave an area
* Masking of communication – 
* Hearing damage - permanent & temporary threshold shift
* Stress
* Strandings & death
